mapper.select: SELECT DISTINCT p.code FROM sys_permission p INNER JOIN sys_user_permission up ON p.id = up.permission_id INNER JOIN sys_user u ON up.user_id = u.id WHERE up.user_id = #{userId} AND u.deleted = 0 AND u.status = 1 AND p.deleted = 0 UNION SELECT DISTINCT m.auth_code FROM sys_menu m INNER JOIN sys_role_menu rm ON m.id = rm.menu_id INNER JOIN sys_user_role ur ON rm.role_id = ur.role_id INNER JOIN sys_user u ON ur.user_id = u.id WHERE ur.user_id = #{userId} AND u.deleted = 0 AND u.status = 1 AND m.auth_code IS NOT NULL AND m.deleted = 0
